title: Unwanted gifts
body: My problem is the supposedly I have at a guy called [REDACTED] two skins have lopped that I did not have and would like to take back the gift and the type somehow get a buster away I would very gladly whom you could take care of that.

replies.body: I'm having some trouble understanding your issue, but if were to take a guess it sounds like a gifting issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help you out individually.  Be sure to give as much detailed information as possible so we can get better context to your specific issue.  We'll reply back asap!
My question is now this answer is best to fit my problem
